title: Ranked LP broken
body:
The LP system for ranked is broken on the new client.
Recently I'll lose 20 LP for any lose, even if you get an S+ and you carried your team yet lost you still lose 20LP.
Then I'll win a game, carry the team, most dmg to champs, in lane, gold, earning A+ - S+ and I'll win 17-19 LP.
How is this in any way balanced?
I havent seen a 20LP win since the last patch update.
I reported this as a bug and haven't heard anything back so hopefully this will bring it to attention there's something wrong with the win lose ratio of LP.

P.S. 
I don't understand why it'd be so hard to set in a player ranking system for loses so those who carry and almost win the game for their team should only lose 10 LP instead of 20.
I've been up and down in Divisions 1-3 because of this LP system even tho I have a higher win than lose ratio in ranked.

replies.body: Our LP system also takes into account how well the system _thinks _ you should do against the enemy team. It will compare your teams's MMR against the enemy teams, and if you lose a match that you _should_ have won, you will lose more than if it thinks you should have lost. You can check out our [**ranked play faq**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ), or hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you want more detailed info on how LP is calculated.
